content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" xmlns:taxo="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/taxonomy/" xmlns:sy="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/syndication/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">   <channel>     <title>DSpace community: Laboratory Sciences</title>     <link>http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/2</link>     <description>Laboratory Sciences</description>     <items>       <rdf:Seq>         <rdf:li resource="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5646" />         <rdf:li resource="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5272" />         <rdf:li resource="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5271" />         <rdf:li resource="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5267" />       </rdf:Seq>     </items>   </channel>   <textInput>     <title>The community's search engine</title>     <description>Search the Channel</description>     <name>s</name>     <link>http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/simple-search</link>   </textInput>   <item rdf:about="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5646">     <title>Production of mucinase and neuraminidase and binding of Shigella to intestinal mucin</title>     <link>http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5646</link>     <description>title: Production of mucinase and neuraminidase and binding of Shigella to intestinal mucin authors: Haider, Khaleda; Hossain, A.; Wanke, C.; Qadri, F.; Ali, S.; Nahar, S. <br>abstract: Production of mucinase and neuraminidase by Shigella spp. and their ability to bind to mucin was investigated. All four species of Shigella produced these enzymes. Virulent and avirulent pairs of Shigella did not differ in their ability to produce the enzymes after 18 h of growth. However, a significant difference in neuraminidase production was noted in Shigella dysenteriae type 1 and S. boydii (12-15) at 10 h growth. Avirulent strains of S. dysenteriae type 1, S. flexneri 2a, and S. boydii bound significantly more amounts of mucin than their virulent counterparts <br></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5272">     <title>Rapid diagnosis of entamoeba histolytica infection and significance of nonoathogenic and pathogenic E. histolytica infections</title>     <link>http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5272</link>     <description>title: Rapid diagnosis of entamoeba histolytica infection and significance of nonoathogenic and pathogenic E. histolytica infections authors: Haque, Rashidul <br></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5271">     <title>Role of helicobacter pylori infection as a risk factor for cholera and a modifier of oral cholera vaccine efficacy</title>     <link>http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5271</link>     <description>title: Role of helicobacter pylori infection as a risk factor for cholera and a modifier of oral cholera vaccine efficacy authors: Albert, M. John; Qadri, Firdausi <br></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5267">     <title>The role and characteristics of diarrhoeagenic E. coli in clinical and epidemilogical investigations</title>     <link>http://dspace.icddrb.org:80/dspace/handle/123456789/5267</link>     <description>title: The role and characteristics of diarrhoeagenic E. coli in clinical and epidemilogical investigations authors: Al-Kabir, H.; Haider, K.; Nahar, S.; Neogi, P.K.B. <br></description>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
